text: @AbbottNews I am chairing a COVID-19 session at the rapid microbiology methods workshop for the Parenteral Drug Association in October. I would like to invite one of your scientists to present on the ID Now (test kit, workflow, etc). Please contact me at info@rapidmicromethods.com.
